评论详情: So comfy, my new go to’s
These pants are perfect for travel Love the fabric They are well made and fit perfectly
Super comfortable!  Love as a go to!  Dress up dress down, great travel pants!!!

This is the second Amazon item I’ve ordered, if they discontinue I may cry, lol! First, the ‘Tall’ size - this alone makes me want to weep tears of joy. The crazy hunt for reasonably priced pants, offered in ‘tall’ is real. My cold little ankles, in the New England winter, thank you. Profusely.  Then the cut- they’re just perfect. Flat across the tummy, no strings, no pleats, no ruching or extra material. Just nice and flat!! The band at the waist isn’t tighter than the material sewn beneath it, so no weird lumpy look. The butt is just perfect, fitted, not skintight and not baggy. The wide legs are modern, they’re not 6 feet wide, a la 90’s -but still visibly wide leg cut. I haven’t seen this cut NOT flattering on someone yet.  The feel. When you’re working at home, and want to be in your jammies all day- but LOOK presentable, these are IT. No one is going to mistake these for office dress pants, they have sports style stretch stitching on the sides of the legs, but for working from home, running errands, etc.. they look fantastic. The fabric, even though it’s super super stretchy and comfortable, doesn’t have that ‘shine’ to them that some sportswear or yoga gear has- they’re matte. Just gorgeous. The colors on these are also great- I hope this seller keeps adding! I’d love even more neutrals.  In a nutshell, these pants are just about perfect, stop reading reviews and buy them already!!! 😂

These pants are very comfortable.  The fabric is great.  It’s not flimsy but not too heavy-it’s just right! The pants also have pockets which is everyone’s favorite.  I bought one pair and went back for three more.

The pants themselves seem well made and nice. However, I am tall and thin (5'7" 120 lbs) and there is no fit for me. I tried the XS and S Tall. The Tall was the right length but S was too loose mainly in the butt.  There is no XS Tall as an option. Thin people can't be tall? They will both be going back.

The fit is true to size but I fall between sizes at 5ft1/2 inch and 126 lbs. probably could use a medium but the small is wearable. Pretty snug on the butt and belly and this fabric is thin. Love the style and sewing is good. The petite length hits the floor without shoes and is just wearable with sneakers on. They’d be fabulous if I were 5ft 2 and 123 lbs! I like them well enough to keep them!
I adore these pants. They make my legs look so long and lean. The material is so soft. I love the pockets in the front. The material is very breathable. These could be my absolute new favorite.
The best.
So beautiful and soft! Love them!
Everything was good
Love that these pants have a longer length option. Fits perfectly. Love the material. I treat them like my lululemons! Make sure you hang dry! Also very slimming!
Love these. They fit great and are made out of quality material.

5’ tall, 135lbs, bottom heavy. Ordered the Petite medium. Pants are a smidge long, but perfect with my tennis shoes on. Super comfy. Love the flare, especially since I have big hips — balances me out. Bought the dark brown, but it’s more of a mix between the tan and chestnut colors.

I bought one earlier this month, and I’m absolutely in love with it. These have become my favorite work pants, so I bought two more pairs today when they are finally on sale again. The fabric is high-quality and has a nice stretch. Highly recommended!!!
I’m a 4/6 and small too small. Material real flimsy
So comfy!  Can be worn as yoga pants or for a day out!

I absolutely love these pants.  They are stretchy and oh so comfortable.  Do keep in mind they run small.  I would normally wear a medium, they were super small.  Went to a Large and they fit, though snug.  The extra large is great for a relaxed fit.  They wash great and always looks nice.  They can be dressed up for down.  They also have pockets.  I have 5 different colors.
Fit well and very comfortable! Very pleased . Good value for price.

I can’t say enough good things about these pants! I bought 2 pair in petite (I’m 4’10 and these were perfect length!) and I love them! These are flattering and beyond comfortable (I wore them on an extremely long flight to Turkey). My daughter and friend bought them after they saw them, I will definitely purchase more.

评论概述: Quality material could work as office wear
评论详情: I am 5'4" 180 lbs and purchased size XL petite. These pants are definitely comfy while not being slouchy and I think they can double as work slacks with the right blouse. I'm really liking the fabric quality, it's thick for being yoga pants, and plan to buy another pair.

These pants were everything I hoped they would be. They are a great wide leg pant for lounge, but I also used them for travel. They look nicer than traditional sweats/joggers. Paired with a white t-shirt and long sweater cardigan, they are perfect long travel days.

These wide leg yoga pants are amazing.  I am 5'1", so I had to cut the bottom of the pants about an inch or so.  The pants are so comfortable and slimming.  I love the pockets!  I have washed them several times.  The pants have kept their shape and color.  I would highly recommend these pants for a sporty or even dressed up look!

评论概述: Above and beyond what I expected!
评论详情: These pants arrived 2 days ago.  Since then, we had dinner with friends, went shopping, went to the grocery store and today to a doctors appointment.  I wore these to each of the events.  They were appropriate at each location.  I recently lost 55 pounds and am now 2 inches shorter.  So finding clothing that fits and look great is a challenge.  My husband even said, “those pants make your butt look great”.  Can’t beat that!!!

Love these wide leg yoga style pants.  The fit is short/petite large is perfect fit, not too tight and not too loose.  Very comfortable and easy to wear.  It is not made for winter wear, it is soft with easy movement.
They are so flattering and work for trail or office!
Great fit! True to size!
I got a size small petite, super soft, comfortable, and I wear it everyday. I’m 4’11, weight: 115 and fits me perfectly after I alter the length! So worth it.

Great comfy black pants. I am 145 5’5 and get the medium and they fit well. Washed once so far but didn’t dry and held up good so far! Only complaint would be that if you wear out in cold weather they are not warm at all. Love the wide legs and pockets though!

I truly do not understand the numerous 5-star reviews on this one! These pants are TTS and the length is spot on... and that's the only reasons for a 1-star review! The material is sooo cheap and the high waist style came up to my bra line (5'4" tall). The pants have extra material around the lower hip area, so much that it bunched up at the crotch .... not a look that I am going for. The fabric felt like a heavy duty garbage bag material. I have 10-year old Yoga pants from the Gap that are in better quality than these cheap pants! These pants are future landfill items ... don't waste your hard earned money on these terrible pants! Returned immediately!!!

评论概述: Medium Tall length is too short
评论详情: I’m 5’9 1/2”, 145 lbs. I got Medium Tall. The waist size is perfect but the length is too short. The inseam is 32” which is NOT considered “tall”. Typically for extended length sizes, “long” starts at 33 1/2” inseam and “tall” is even longer.
I’m 5’7” purchased XXL and they are too long. Didn’t request long size, but they are about 1inch too long. Great comfort but trying to decide if I need to return.

The materials seemed fine as a standard yoga pants, but the inseam is way too long and I've noticed similar complaints about sizes in the other reviews. Be warned, this product may be for you if you're of longer frame.

评论概述: My FAVORITE Amazon Pants as a Petite Women
评论详情: 125lbs and 5 ft - Wear S Petite (but the xs fit as well) These work for running errands or going to the office! I own 2 pairs and buying a third! I absolutely love them!

Fit great!

I wear these to work or on the weekend.  Great fit, some tummy control but not too much.. fits as expected
I received these yesterday and I’m wearing them today. Very comfortable and good fit. I would buy other colours.

I love this! I’m 5’3” and I got the petite size S. It’s thick, comfortable and the length is perfect. I’m so glad it has pockets. I don’t like wearing tight pants, I think it’s kind of inappropriate, I prefer modest loose pants. I will definitely order more in different colors.
You can dress it up you can dress it down. Can’t go wrong with them.
Excellent work pants! It looks great with heels or flats and is extremely comfortable!

I could wear these every day! The fit is great, tops doesn’t roll and the pockets are deep. I’ll buy again!

Ok I’m just going to say, this might be the best pair of pants I have ever purchased! I’m 5’2 on a good day , 130. I bought medium and they fit like a dream. I decided to buy these because they were available in petite. I have really enjoyed wearing them. They fit great and are really comfortable. The length is perfect for me, and I wear them all of the time. They can be dressed up or dressed down. For reference, I’m 5’3, 130 lbs and I decided to get a small because I did not want the waist part being too tight on my stomach area.

I purchased the L petite. Now I see why people pay over $30 for these pants (when they should be about $10 cheaper). It’s the fit. They look exceptionally good on and are particularly slimming. It’s the perfect wide leg. The waist is somewhat fitted, so if you’re unsure about sizing, definitely go up. I’ve already ordered my 2nd pair!
My favorite yoga pants! I like how they fit around the waist but are loose-fitting around the legs. I'm comfortable wearing these shopping and can even golf in them.
One pair were fine. Two pair were wrong length.
They are so comfortable. Just wished they came in a true red color also. Loved these so much, I ordered two more pair.

I loved these in black so I ordered them in the dark coffee color. I just put them on and sat down to notice a stain down the thigh of the leg. Very disappointing because I love the fit and the deep pockets

It's not easy to find pants that are long enough so I appreciate the tall option. They are definitely long enough and overall comfortable.  The material is soft and does not attract a lot of lint. They do not fall down easily.
Nice fabric and seasonal color. The did not fit me well. But they have good reviews by others.
These are perfect! Love these! I’m tall & bought a very similar pair from Amazon that were much too short.
These are nice. Comfortable and soft material. The style is not what I expected but they work for casual wear nicely which is the reason I don’t give them a 5 star.
Soft with a good fit. Pants length was good for me, but I am 5'4", so may be short for some.

The pants fit real good, best pair I've every ordered
These pants fit like a dream. I get a lot of compliments when I wear them.

These Promover wide-leg pants are wonderful! I like that I can wear them to yoga, throw a sweater over my yoga shirt, and wear them to lunch without looking like I am in workout clothes. They fit well, are very comfortable, and the black and light khaki are great colors. I am eyeing a third pair.

Like the high waist. Very comfortable pants. I wear them casual days. Not the fabric I would likely choose for dressing up. Could wear as workout but wide leg not as good as joggers for most machine exercises. Heavier Weight & fabric good quality. Not see through. Price point good.

They feel like my leggings but have a classy look! Match with a cute button up and you have yourself a work outfit. Throw on a tank top or baggy sweater and you have a chill day at home look. The taupe is classic, I'm grabbing more colors. I wear a medium in leggings so I bought a plain MEDIUM and it fits perfectly. I'm 5'5, 140lbs.
Nice for lounge pants, but these are really wide in the tops of my legs, not fitted like yoga pants. Opting for a smaller size as the fabric is great with nice pockets
These are so soft and comfortable. Highly recommend

I'm 5' 110ish lbs. I love these pants!! They're so cute and comfy, and I can get away with wearing them to work. With a thick, quality sweater, they look nice enough to pass for work pants. I loved then so much, I bought two, so I could get through the work week.

I love these pants so much, I literally have 6 pairs. I'm 5 feet tall, size 12/14 and the petite large is perfect on me (although I would probably get away with a medium as well). They're super comfortable and versatile - I wear them at home, for going to the gym, to yoga, just out and about running errands, etc. Normally I wouldn't wear loungewear outside my home or the gym but these look so polished, they're good for wearing out normally as well. They're perfect for travel too - again, I'm not one to wear lounge clothes on flights because I think it's in poor taste to wear like sweatpants at the airport, but these look so elevated, they could just be trousers. And again, super comfy!! Honestly I have to stop myself from buying more cause I have enough lol.
I got the small and 29 inseam and it is big definately for a taller person. I am 117 pounds. 4’11
Good quality but seemed a size too small

These wide leg pants fit perfectly to size. I got a medium and I’m a size 10. They have a wide leg without looking big and baggy and are super soft and not see through.  I needed a wider leg,  comfortable pants after having a knee replacement, and these are great. I got them in two colors!

I love these pants. I am short 5'2 and weigh about 135 pounds. I ordered the small, petite. I am going to order a couple more pairs. I prefer the darker colors. I ordered Navy Blue and they are the perfect length for a petite person. Love how they go over the tummy and they are very stylish.

Being 5ft, I always have trouble finding pants that don't drag on the ground. I was very close to giving up on my mission to find pants for my job, so I ordered a petite small in hopes this pair would work for me. These do not touch the ground AT ALL, they are right above the floor and sit at a perfect length. They are super flattering and soft with no weird bunches or lines in the hips and crotch, unlike a lot of athletic wide-leg pants. The quality, fit, and material are worth the price!!

Love the fabric and material hand of the pants ordered. They lay nice and smooth.  I plan to use them for travel.  They look dressier than yoga pants. I’m 5’3, 140 lbs and ordered medium. They fit perfect.

评论概述: The pants are exactly as advertised
评论详情: Love the pants!!! I’ve lost a significant amount of weight and my legs have extra skin but the pants make my legs look flawless. The little stretch makes them comfortable to wear around the house or out.

评论概述: Overall love but seams are falling apart
评论详情: I love these pants! The fit, the thickness everything is great. I've worn these pants about 4 times and I've noticed the seams threads are coming undone.

评论概述: Not for girls with hips and thighs
评论详情: I have short legs and normally wear a short length. The length was perfect but the small was too tight in the hip and thigh which caused the material to pull in that area. The medium was too big in the waist. The were very comfortable, thicker than I expected. Too thick, I think, for the warmer temperatures in the south where I live. I wanted to live them but had to return both sizes.

I am 5’2, 133lbs Bought a small and medium petite because I wasn’t sure about size. I kept the small. The pants are cute And initially thought the leg was too wide. After trying on pants, width and length perfect . The material Is thin so there is not much too hold in Belly bulges but design helps hide it a bit. If they had More tummy Control would have given it 5 stars. I did not find that they ran large as in other reviews.

It is so hard to find wide leg yoga pants that fit me length wise as a petite girl. I weigh 163 and I am 5'2".  I ordered a large and I love everything about these pants!  These pants come in PETITE.AWESOME! They are so flattering, and I love the pockets and the soft feel of the fabric.  I just placed an order for 3 more pairs. I highly recommend these!

The fit and length are perfect.  Well made and look nice enough to go out in. They will make a good travel pant.  My only comment - the static. It went away after I wore them for a while.  I live in Denver where because it is so dry, static happens.  Static Gard helps.
to wear pants were very comfortable gray fit

评论概述: Fabric a little bit too thin.
评论详情: These were not quite long enough for me (I'm 6 ft tall) but mostly the fabric was too thin no compression at all so to buy such a light color didn't work. I could probably recommend these but darker colors also if you don't need any sort of tummy control.

I wear a size 10 and bought the L.  They fit well.  I am 5'7" and they are long.  The top of the waist comes up quite high -- but they do fit and are QUITE comfortable.  I love the pocket and know I will wear these alot.
